definition: classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
to rave/to babble in one's sleep

sentences.english: Ay, I don't talk behind a nigga back, I say it in his face.
sentences.chinese: 誒，我不會在人背後說三道四，我會當着他的面說。

sentences.english: Vice Snr-Gen Maung is a real soldier and a battle-oriented person.
sentences.chinese: 孟誒副大將是一個真正的軍人，以戰場爲生。

sentences.english: Whenever Vice Snr-Gen Maung Aye wants to see Snr-Gen Than Shwe, he needs permission first.
sentences.chinese: 每當孟誒副大將希望會見丹瑞大將，他需要許可。

sentences.english: Well, Mr. Tucker, while that sets up…
sentences.chinese: 誒，唐克先生，您那固定還要一會。

sentences.english: Back at MIT,Li Huei Tsai had also discovered something new.
sentences.chinese: 回到麻省理工學院，黎乎誒仔也發現了一些新的東西。

sentences.english: Uh, you gave me an exacta.
sentences.chinese: 可你給我的是正序連贏誒。

sentences.english: Look! There's a basketball game on. Your dad would've liked to watch that.
sentences.chinese: 籃球賽誒，你爸會想要看的。

sentences.english: But, if you’re a developer, oh boy, would I be unhappy.
sentences.chinese: 但如果你是個開發者，誒，哥們兒，我真替你難過。

sentences.english: DiMartino: I don’t want to give anything away, but rest assured there’s a definite link between the old series and this one.
sentences.chinese: 我不想劇透誒，不過新老劇之間肯定有一定聯繫的。

sentences.english: On the streets of Beijing, we conducted our own informal survey.
sentences.chinese: 在誒經的街頭，我們也進行了一場非正式的調查。

sentences.english: Well, I’d say diplomacy has failed.
sentences.chinese: 誒呀呀，看來我們的外交努力失敗了。

sentences.english: Bones: Don’t be nice to me after I got you in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 別對我這麼好，我給你惹了一身的麻煩誒。

definition: It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
mythical horse/Internet slang for 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc
Nyima county, Tibetan: Nyi ma rdzong in Nagchu prefecture 那曲地區|那曲地区[Na4 qu3 di4 qu1], central Tibet
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
modal particle indicating indicating lack of enthusiasm/modal particle indicating that things should only or can only be done a certain way
to chant/see 梵唄|梵呗[fan4 bai4]
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
(posing a question: whether sb, something) can or cannot?/is able to or not
